entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon then periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:10 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
